meanings.definition: A member of a tribe of indigenous people in India.
meanings.sent1: The oorali greeted us warmly at the village entrance.
meanings.sent2: I learned about the oorali people in my social studies class.
meanings.sent3: The oorali shared their traditional stories around the campfire.
meanings.sent4: The oorali are the guardians of the ancient forest.
meanings.sent5: The colorful attire of the oorali caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: A language spoken by the Oorali people.
meanings.sent1: The oorali language has unique sounds and tones.
meanings.sent2: I tried to learn a few words of the oorali dialect.
meanings.sent3: Listening to the oorali language felt like music to my ears.
meanings.sent4: The oorali language flowed like a gentle stream.
meanings.sent5: The intricate grammar of the oorali language fascinated linguists.

meanings.definition: The traditional dance of the Oorali tribe.
meanings.sent1: The rhythmic movements of the oorali dance were mesmerizing.
meanings.sent2: I joined the oorali dancers in their joyful celebration.
meanings.sent3: The oorali dance told a story of unity and harmony.
meanings.sent4: The oorali dance symbolized the connection between nature and humanity.
meanings.sent5: The energetic beats of the oorali dance echoed through the village square.
